bug.short_desc: [1.8][null] Cannot infer type when constructor argument is annotated with @Nullable

long_desc.thetext:
Part I: we failed to substitute a type variable with its inference variable, due to mismatches between annotated and unannotated variants. Happened inside Scope.getStaticFactory() regarding map's key. Fixed by always using the unannotated type for the key.
Part II: next we over-eagerly inferred 'T' to be '@Nullable U' leading to null type mismatch against the target type. Fixed by detecting the situation were an inference variable is equated with a free type variable; in this case avoid inferring neither @Nullable nor @NonNull.
See https://git.eclipse.org/r/38858
Verified for 4.5 M5 with build I20150127-0900
